casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quintel Martinez AUGUSTINE 130A03-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2018 Ms. Gretchen Engel, Attorney at Law, Durham, Mr. James E. Ferguson, II, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Augustine, Quintel Martinez Ms. Danielle Marquis Elder, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Jonathan P. Babb, Special Counsel to Attorney General, Mr. William R. West, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 3rd of May 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of May 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 2nd day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
